sections.title: The Ambivalence of the Fish Symbol
sections.thesis: The fish motif as a paradoxical image holding opposites, shadow, and eschatological tension.

sections.body: This chapter matters because it clarifies the lens you will use throughout Aion: symbolic tensions are not distractions, but the material of psychological transformation.

terms.definition: A historically layered motif in Aion that carries paradoxical meanings of totality, salvation, and shadow.
The tension of contrary psychic tendencies whose containment can generate transformation.
A symbolic counter-pole to the Christ image, expressing excluded shadow aspects within a totality frame.
